footer.text: Character Guide • Build: Mavuika | Update Date: 01/03/2025 | Editor: zmizuneko

fields.name: Best Weapon(s):
fields.value:
__A thousand blazing suns__ - Mavuika's signature and best weapon.
__Beacon of the Reed Sea__, __Redhorn Stonethresher__, __Wolf's Gravestone__, __The Unforged__ - good stat sticks with their ups and downs, but usable on Mavuika
Note: The unforged suggests you want to run a shielder, and Wolf's gravestone might fall off due to many external ATK buffs Mavuika can receive.

fields.name: Replacement Weapon(s):
fields.value:
__Serpent Spine__ - best 4 star option.
__Mailed Flower__ - a surprisingly good event weapon, use it if you have it.
__Tidal shadow__ - best free-to-play option.

fields.name: Main Stats Priority
fields.value: <sands> Elemental mastery/ATK%|<goblet> Pyro DMG bonus%|<circlet> Crit DMG%
